reviews.review: I mean it's better than Nebakular Drop

Portal - тот случай когда стал подобной крысой и над тобой ставят один опыт - работу порталов. Portal - интересная игра от Valve, где нужно только одно - выбраться с лаборатории с помощью порталов, а вместе с этим проходить разного рода ловушки, препятствия и прочее, "квест с экшеном". Короче, игра с интересным сюжетом и загадками. (Долой тортик, мне так его не хватает). Рекомендую!

NB
我5个小时才通关，我是废物
Good game glad i finally started playing.

Portal and it's squeal will forever be in my top 10 games of all time. I reckon this might've been the game to get me into PC gaming. I love everything about this game from the level design to the dry humour, visual style, and haunting existential dread. This game should be in every gamers library.

This was a great setup for what Portal 2 would become. 
The Story revolves around Chell and her journey through the Aperture Science Laboratories, being tested by the robot known as GLaDOS and her efforts to try and escape her 'tests'. The only character there is in this game is GLaDOS as Chell is a silent protagonist. GLaDOS as a character is ok in this game but definitely improves in the sequel. The story isn't really the main focus here as it only serves the purpose as to move the player along the levels. 
The Setting of the Aperture Science Labs its well designed for what type of scenario this is set in.
Graphically, due to the art direction being so simplistic, it doesn't need high settings for it to look good and has also made it look pretty modern for how old the game is. 
Sound and Audio work very well as sounds from the moving levels to the portal gun are well fitting. 
In terms of gameplay, this is where Portal really shines. The main thing you will be doing is solving puzzles which i must say are challenging enough for everyone to enjoy and are very satisfying when they have been completed. All puzzles need the use of the portal gun which has become a staple for the games for good reasons as the developers really revolved how levels would play out using the gun. I think the portal gun is just amazing for all the different things you can do while using it. There are also cubes, laser platforms and jump pads that are also used to aid the player to complete levels and even they are revolved around using the portal gun. The enemies in this game (turrets) are fine but only prove to be an obstacle rather than an actual enemy. Finally the boss fight was decent but at the same time felt a little simplistic. 
Overall, Portal is a great game that introduced a new way for player to interact with puzzle games and i would recommend to those who are hardcore fans of the second game or to those who want to sink their feet into Aperture Labs and get a feel for what Portal really holds.

[h1] One of the big ones [/h1]
[b] Portal [/b] is one of those classic PC games everyone has heard about.
It's fame it's well deserved. Usually coming in a pack, I'd say it's worth to get both Portal and Portal 2.

The game consists in variated 3D puzzles which you can solve using your Portal gun. This gun allows you to create doors comunicated. The entrance is blue, and the way out orange. Just 2. With this "simple" mechanic you will be solving different puzzles which for a game which came out in late 2007, still feel very fresh and provides entertainment. 
In addition, there's a very interesting story plot which gets deeper in Portal 2.
[i] One of the classics you absolutely need in your PC! [/i]

Momentum, a function of mass and velocity, is conserved between portals. In layman's terms, speedy thing goes in, speedy thing comes out.

fuck yes, Ive sped run this game (on xbox thats why my time is low) about 50 times (full game just having fun runs going fast) and i can honestly say this is a really good game for litrely everyone. its not perfect but the story telling gladoses sarcastic coments and perfectly timed 2 sence it makes me feel difrent then any other game. The portals can be confusing at times but once you grasp your mind its a lot of fun. (expecily when you know what your doing cause it ends up giving you a chalage to complete it more effecently and each run feels sooo good to do). HIGH respect for valve for this one

One of the best games I have played lately.

This game is a masterpiece, 10/10, it even cake with a free cake!

Now I am not much of a Portal fan like others are, I'm more of a Half-Life kind of guy but this game in particular always manages to give me nostalgia in it's purest form.

The souless white walls, the eerie sounds, they all scream 2007 to me in a way I can't quite explain. HL2 isn't as nostalgic feeling as Portal to me, maybe it's because I knew about Portal way before Half-Life? 

The game itself besides the nostalgia is great as well, would recommend to anyone new to video games on PC or in general, the developer team of new graduates really knocked it out of the park.

The legacy of this game will be felt for many years on the internet and in the gaming industry.
Much more simple story-wise than Portal 2, but still a great puzzle game. 8/10 because GLaDOS' voice is soothing.

This game is as close to perfect as they come.  It's concise, cerebral, unique, but most importantly it's atmospheric, and it deftly establishes an environment that is at once quirky and ominous without any exposition.  This is probably one of the best and most completely conceived games of any genre.  It gives a player the sense that the developers knew what they wanted to produce and executed it perfectly.  It stands up as well today, and sharing it with my kids has been a thrill.

vale muito o preço pago em promoções junto com o 2 (ainda não joguei) e te digo, é uma experiência diferentemente e muito divertida que te deixa entretido e envolvido com os puzzles e dialogos com a GLADUS do INICIO AO FIM, é impossivel não ficar impressionado com este jogo e com a diversão que ele proporciona por meio de monologos longos da GLADUS, é simplesmente genial!
Compre! jogue! é uma obra de arte da historia dos jogos que não deve ser esquecida!
